release.description: First release under my control (previous releases https://github.com/geertjanw/eclipsecodeformatter_for_netbeans)
release.action: Removed default formatter action and added shortcut (Ctrl + Meta/Cmd + F) for external formatter action
Support for guarded documents (documents that are created by the NetBeans GUI builder, guarded blocks are skipped of course, but everything in between can be formatted)
Switched from ANT to Maven project
